First Collabrative Project - MicroWars

25th July 2018

Microwars clone uses the SFML library for graphics and audio. The game consists of orbs which small smaller units which can be used to caputure other orbs. The game ends when either all orbs have been captured by the same player or when all units are of the same colour. So far has single player features have been implemented . We'll start on the networking components from mid-August 2018. Once finished anyone on the same WiFi/Ethernet connection should be able to play the game.
